non_compliant.section: We use cookies to improve your user experience. You may see our Privacy Policy for more information. By continuing to use this website, you agree to our use of cookies.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of the data subject's wishes by which he or she, by a statement or by a clear affirmative action, signifies agreement to the processing of personal data relating to him or her.
non_compliant.amend: The user should be able to refuse cookies or withdraw consent as easily as they gave it.  The website should clearly state what cookies are used for and obtain explicit consent before setting any non-essential cookies.  Consider providing a cookie management tool and granular consent options.
